verses.verse: ( Joseph and Potiphar’s Wife) וְיוֹסֵ֖ף <WH3130> wə·yō·w·sêp̄ Meanwhile, Joseph הוּרַ֣ד <WH3381> hū·raḏ had been taken down מִצְרָ֑יְמָה <WH4714> miṣ·rā·yə·māh to Egypt, וַיִּקְנֵ֡הוּ <WH7069> way·yiq·nê·hū bought him פּוֹטִיפַר֩ <WH6318> pō·w·ṭî·p̄ar named Potiphar, סְרִ֨יס <WH5631> sə·rîs an officer פַּרְעֹ֜ה <WH6547> par·‘ōh of Pharaoh שַׂ֤ר <WH8269> śar and captain הַטַּבָּחִים֙ <WH2876> haṭ·ṭab·bā·ḥîm of the guard, אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> ’îš ... מִצְרִ֔י <WH4713> miṣ·rî where an Egyptian מִיַּד֙ <WH3027> mî·yaḏ from הַיִּשְׁמְעֵאלִ֔ים <WH3459> hay·yiš·mə·‘ê·lîm the Ishmaelites אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> ’ă·šer who הוֹרִדֻ֖הוּ <WH3381> hō·w·ri·ḏu·hū had taken him שָֽׁמָּה׃ <WH8033> šām·māh there.

וַיְהִ֤י <WH1961> way·hî was יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah·weh And the LORD אֶת־ <WH854> ’eṯ- with יוֹסֵ֔ף <WH3130> yō·w·sêp̄ Joseph, וַיְהִ֖י <WH1961> way·hî and he became אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> ’îš man, מַצְלִ֑יחַ <WH6743> maṣ·lî·aḥ a successful וַיְהִ֕י <WH1961> way·hî serving בְּבֵ֥ית <WH1004> bə·ḇêṯ in the household אֲדֹנָ֖יו <WH113> ’ă·ḏō·nāw master. הַמִּצְרִֽי׃ <WH4713> ham·miṣ·rî of his Egyptian

וַיַּ֣רְא <WH7200> way·yar saw אֲדֹנָ֔יו <WH113> ’ă·ḏō·nāw When his master כִּ֥י <WH3588> kî that יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD אִתּ֑וֹ <WH854> ’it·tōw [was] with him וְכֹל֙ <WH3605> wə·ḵōl in all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> ’ă·šer- - ה֣וּא <WH1931> hū he עֹשֶׂ֔ה <WH6213> ‘ō·śeh did, יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah·weh [and] מַצְלִ֥יחַ <WH6743> maṣ·lî·aḥ made him prosper בְּיָדֽוֹ׃ <WH3027> bə·yā·ḏōw ...

וַיִּמְצָ֨א <WH4672> way·yim·ṣā found יוֹסֵ֥ף <WH3130> yō·w·sêp̄ Joseph חֵ֛ן <WH2580> ḥên favor בְּעֵינָ֖יו <WH5869> bə·‘ê·nāw in his sight וַיְשָׁ֣רֶת <WH8334> way·šā·reṯ and became his personal attendant אֹת֑וֹ <WH853> ’ō·ṯōw -. וַיַּפְקִדֵ֙הוּ֙ <WH6485> way·yap̄·qi·ḏê·hū Potiphar put him עַל־ <WH5921> ‘al- in charge of בֵּית֔וֹ <WH1004> bê·ṯōw his household וְכָל־ <WH3605> wə·ḵāl with everything יֶשׁ־ <WH3426> yeš- he owned. ל֖וֹ Prep│3ms ( lōw) ... נָתַ֥ן 5414 V-Qal-Perf-3ms ( nā·ṯan) and entrusted בְּיָדֽוֹ׃ 3027 Prep-b│N-fsc│3ms ( bə·yā·ḏōw) him

וַיְהִ֡י <WH1961> way·hî מֵאָז֩ <WH227> mê·’āz From the time הִפְקִ֨יד <WH6485> hip̄·qîḏ that he put [Joseph] in charge אֹת֜וֹ <WH853> ’ō·ṯōw - בְּבֵית֗וֹ <WH1004> bə·ḇê·ṯōw of his household וְעַל֙ <WH5921> wə·‘al and כָּל־ <WH3605> kāl- all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> ’ă·šer - יֶשׁ־ <WH3426> yeš- he owned, ל֔וֹ Prep│3ms ( lōw) - וַיְבָ֧רֶךְ 1288 Conj-w│V-Piel-ConsecImperf-3ms ( way·ḇā·reḵ) blessed יְהוָ֛ה 3068 N-proper-ms ( Yah·weh) the LORD אֶת־ 853 DirObjM ( ’eṯ-) - בֵּ֥ית 1004 N-msc ( bêṯ) household הַמִּצְרִ֖י 4713 Art│N-proper-ms ( ham·miṣ·rî) the Egyptian’s בִּגְלַ֣ל 1558 Prep-b│N-msc ( biḡ·lal) on account of יוֹסֵ֑ף 3130 N-proper-ms ( yō·w·sêp̄) [him]. וַיְהִ֞י 1961 Conj-w│V-Qal-ConsecImperf-3ms ( way·hî) ... בִּרְכַּ֤ת 1293 N-fsc ( bir·kaṯ) blessing יְהוָה֙ 3068 N-proper-ms ( Yah·weh) The LORD’s בְּכָל־ 3605 Prep-b│N-msc ( bə·ḵāl) [was] on everything אֲשֶׁ֣ר 834 Pro-r ( ’ă·šer) - יֶשׁ־ 3426 Adv ( yeš-) he owned ל֔וֹ Prep│3ms ( lōw) ..., בַּבַּ֖יִת 1004 Prep-b, Art│N-ms ( bab·ba·yiṯ) both in his house וּבַשָּׂדֶֽה׃ 7704 Conj-w, Prep-b, Art│N-ms ( ū·ḇaś·śā·ḏeh) and in his field.

וַיַּעֲזֹ֣ב <WH5800> way·ya·‘ă·zōḇ So [Potiphar] left כָּל־ <WH3605> kāl- all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> ’ă·šer- that לוֹ֮ Prep│3ms ( lōw) he owned בְּיַד־ 3027 Prep-b│N-fsc ( bə·yaḏ-) care; יוֹסֵף֒ 3130 N-proper-ms ( yō·w·sêp̄) in Joseph’s וְלֹא־ 3808 Conj-w│Adv-NegPrt ( wə·lō-) he did not יָדַ֤ע 3045 V-Qal-Perf-3ms ( yā·ḏa‘) concern himself אִתּוֹ֙ 854 Prep│3ms ( ’it·tōw) ... מְא֔וּמָה 3972 N-ms ( mə·’ū·māh) with anything כִּ֥י 3588 Conj ( kî) except אִם־ 518 Conj ( ’im-) ... הַלֶּ֖חֶם 3899 Art│N-ms ( hal·le·ḥem) the food אֲשֶׁר־ 834 Pro-r ( ’ă·šer-) - ה֣וּא 1931 Pro-3ms ( hū) he אוֹכֵ֑ל 398 V-Qal-Prtcpl-ms ( ’ō·w·ḵêl) ate. וַיְהִ֣י 1961 Conj-w│V-Qal-ConsecImperf-3ms ( way·hî) was יוֹסֵ֔ף 3130 N-proper-ms ( yō·w·sêp̄) Now Joseph יְפֵה־ 3303 Adj-msc ( yə·p̄êh-) well-built תֹ֖אַר 8389 N-ms ( ṯō·’ar) ... וִיפֵ֥ה 3303 Conj-w│Adj-msc ( wî·p̄êh) and handsome מַרְאֶֽה׃ 4758 N-ms ( mar·’eh) ...,

וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> way·hî and אַחַר֙ <WH310> ’a·ḥar after some time הַדְּבָרִ֣ים <WH1697> had·də·ḇā·rîm ... הָאֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> hā·’êl·leh ... וַתִּשָּׂ֧א <WH5375> wat·tiś·śā cast אֵֽשֶׁת־ <WH802> ’ê·šeṯ- wife אֲדֹנָ֛יו <WH113> ’ă·ḏō·nāw his master’s אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - עֵינֶ֖יהָ <WH5869> ‘ê·ne·hā her eyes אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- upon יוֹסֵ֑ף <WH3130> yō·w·sêp̄ Joseph וַתֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> wat·tō·mer and said, שִׁכְבָ֥ה <WH7901> šiḵ·ḇāh “ Sleep עִמִּֽי׃ <WH5973> ‘im·mî with me. ”

וַיְמָאֵ֓ן׀ <WH3985> way·mā·’ên But he refused. וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> way·yō·mer he said אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- to אֵ֣שֶׁת <WH802> ’ê·šeṯ wife, אֲדֹנָ֔יו <WH113> ’ă·ḏō·nāw his master’s הֵ֣ן <WH2005> hên “ Look, ” אֲדֹנִ֔י <WH113> ’ă·ḏō·nî my master לֹא־ <WH3808> lō- does not יָדַ֥ע <WH3045> yā·ḏa‘ concern himself אִתִּ֖י <WH854> ’it·tî “ with me here, מַה־ <WH4100> mah- with anything בַּבָּ֑יִת <WH1004> bab·bā·yiṯ in his house, וְכֹ֥ל <WH3605> wə·ḵōl everything אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> ’ă·šer- - יֶשׁ־ <WH3426> yeš- he owns ל֖וֹ Prep│3ms ( lōw) to נָתַ֥ן 5414 V-Qal-Perf-3ms ( nā·ṯan) and he has entrusted בְּיָדִֽי׃ 3027 Prep-b│N-fsc│1cs ( bə·yā·ḏî) my care.

אֵינֶ֨נּוּ <WH369> ’ê·nen·nū No גָד֜וֹל <WH1419> ḡā·ḏō·wl is greater בַּבַּ֣יִת <WH1004> bab·ba·yiṯ house הַזֶּה֮ <WH2088> haz·zeh one in this מִמֶּנִּי֒ <WH4480> mim·men·nî than I am. וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> wə·lō- nothing חָשַׂ֤ךְ <WH2820> ḥā·śaḵ He has withheld מִמֶּ֙נִּי֙ <WH4480> mim·men·nî from me מְא֔וּמָה <WH3972> mə·’ū·māh ... כִּ֥י <WH3588> kî except אִם־ <WH518> ’im- you, אוֹתָ֖ךְ <WH853> ’ō·w·ṯāḵ - בַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> ba·’ă·šer because אַתְּ־ <WH859> ’at- you אִשְׁתּ֑וֹ <WH802> ’iš·tōw are his wife. וְאֵ֨יךְ <WH349> wə·’êḵ So how אֶֽעֱשֶׂ֜ה <WH6213> ’e·‘ĕ·śeh could I do הָרָעָ֤ה <WH7451> hā·rā·‘āh evil הַגְּדֹלָה֙ <WH1419> hag·gə·ḏō·lāh a great הַזֹּ֔את <WH2063> haz·zōṯ such וְחָטָ֖אתִי <WH2398> wə·ḥā·ṭā·ṯî and sin לֵֽאלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> lê·lō·hîm against God? ”

וַיְהִ֕י <WH1961> way·hî Although כְּדַבְּרָ֥הּ <WH1696> kə·ḏab·bə·rāh [Potiphar’s wife] spoke אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- to יוֹסֵ֖ף <WH3130> yō·w·sêp̄ Joseph י֣וֹם׀ <WH3117> yō·wm day י֑וֹם <WH3117> yō·wm after day, וְלֹא־ <WH3808> wə·lō- he refused שָׁמַ֥ע <WH8085> šā·ma‘ ... אֵלֶ֛יהָ <WH413> ’ê·le·hā ... לִשְׁכַּ֥ב <WH7901> liš·kaḇ to go to bed אֶצְלָ֖הּ <WH681> ’eṣ·lāh with her לִהְי֥וֹת <WH1961> lih·yō·wṯ [or even] be עִמָּֽהּ׃ <WH5973> ‘im·māh near her.

וַיְהִי֙ <WH1961> way·hî however, כְּהַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> kə·hay·yō·wm One day הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> haz·zeh ..., וַיָּבֹ֥א <WH935> way·yā·ḇō [Joseph] went הַבַּ֖יְתָה <WH1004> hab·bay·ṯāh into the house לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <WH6213> la·‘ă·śō·wṯ to attend to מְלַאכְתּ֑וֹ <WH4399> mə·laḵ·tōw his work, וְאֵ֨ין <WH369> wə·’ên and not אִ֜ישׁ <WH376> ’îš a single מֵאַנְשֵׁ֥י <WH582> mê·’an·šê servant הַבַּ֛יִת <WH1004> hab·ba·yiṯ household שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> šām [was] בַּבָּֽיִת׃ <WH1004> bab·bā·yiṯ inside.

וַתִּתְפְּשֵׂ֧הוּ <WH8610> wat·tiṯ·pə·śê·hū She grabbed [Joseph] בְּבִגְד֛וֹ <WH899> bə·ḇiḡ·ḏōw by his cloak לֵאמֹ֖ר <WH559> lê·mōr and said, שִׁכְבָ֣ה <WH7901> šiḵ·ḇāh “ Sleep עִמִּ֑י <WH5973> ‘im·mî with me! ” וַיַּעֲזֹ֤ב <WH5800> way·ya·‘ă·zōḇ But leaving בִּגְדוֹ֙ <WH899> biḡ·ḏōw his cloak בְּיָדָ֔הּ <WH3027> bə·yā·ḏāh in her hand, וַיָּ֖נָס <WH5127> way·yā·nās he escaped וַיֵּצֵ֥א <WH3318> way·yê·ṣê and ran הַחֽוּצָה׃ <WH2351> ha·ḥū·ṣāh outside.

( Joseph Falsely Imprisoned) וַיְהִי֙ <WH1961> way·hî - כִּרְאוֹתָ֔הּ <WH7200> kir·’ō·w·ṯāh When she saw כִּֽי־ <WH3588> kî- that עָזַ֥ב <WH5800> ‘ā·zaḇ he had left בִּגְד֖וֹ <WH899> biḡ·ḏōw his cloak בְּיָדָ֑הּ <WH3027> bə·yā·ḏāh in her hand וַיָּ֖נָס <WH5127> way·yā·nās and had run הַחֽוּצָה׃ <WH2351> ha·ḥū·ṣāh out [of the house],

וַתִּקְרָ֞א <WH7121> wat·tiq·rā she called לְאַנְשֵׁ֣י <WH582> lə·’an·šê servants. בֵיתָ֗הּ <WH1004> ḇê·ṯāh her household וַתֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> wat·tō·mer she said לָהֶם֙ Prep│3mp ( lā·hem) , לֵאמֹ֔ר 559 Prep-l│V-Qal-Inf ( lê·mōr) - רְא֗וּ 7200 V-Qal-Imp-mp ( rə·’ū) “ Look, ” הֵ֥בִיא 935 V-Hifil-Perf-3ms ( hê·ḇî) has been brought לָ֛נוּ Prep│1cp ( lā·nū) to us אִ֥ישׁ 376 N-ms ( ’îš) ... עִבְרִ֖י 5680 N-proper-ms ( ‘iḇ·rî) “ this Hebrew לְצַ֣חֶק 6711 Prep-l│V-Piel-Inf ( lə·ṣa·ḥeq) to make sport בָּ֑נוּ Prep│1cp ( bā·nū) of us. בָּ֤א 935 V-Qal-Perf-3ms ( bā) He came אֵלַי֙ 413 Prep│1cs ( ’ê·lay) to me לִשְׁכַּ֣ב 7901 Prep-l│V-Qal-Inf ( liš·kaḇ) so he could sleep עִמִּ֔י 5973 Prep│1cs ( ‘im·mî) with me, וָאֶקְרָ֖א 7121 Conj-w│V-Qal-ConsecImperf-1cs ( wā·’eq·rā) but I screamed בְּק֥וֹל 6963 Prep-b│N-ms ( bə·qō·wl) as loud גָּדֽוֹל׃ 1419 Adj-ms ( gā·ḏō·wl) as I could.

וַיְהִ֣י <WH1961> way·hî - כְשָׁמְע֔וֹ <WH8085> ḵə·šā·mə·‘ōw When he heard me כִּֽי־ <WH3588> kî- ... הֲרִימֹ֥תִי <WH7311> hă·rî·mō·ṯî scream for help קוֹלִ֖י <WH6963> qō·w·lî ..., וָאֶקְרָ֑א <WH7121> wā·’eq·rā ... וַיַּעֲזֹ֤ב <WH5800> way·ya·‘ă·zōḇ he left בִּגְדוֹ֙ <WH899> biḡ·ḏōw his cloak אֶצְלִ֔י <WH681> ’eṣ·lî beside me וַיָּ֖נָס <WH5127> way·yā·nās and ran וַיֵּצֵ֥א <WH3318> way·yê·ṣê ... הַחֽוּצָה׃ <WH2351> ha·ḥū·ṣāh out [of the house]. ”

וַתַּנַּ֥ח <WH5117> wat·tan·naḥ So [Potiphar’s wife] kept בִּגְד֖וֹ <WH899> biḡ·ḏōw Joseph’s cloak אֶצְלָ֑הּ <WH681> ’eṣ·lāh beside her עַד־ <WH5704> ‘aḏ- until בּ֥וֹא <WH935> bō·w came אֲדֹנָ֖יו <WH113> ’ă·ḏō·nāw his master אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- ... בֵּיתֽוֹ׃ <WH1004> bê·ṯōw home.
